member.name: CREATESTRUCTA
member.summary: Defines the initialization parameters passed to the window procedure of an application. These members are identical to the parameters of the function.

summary.para: Contains additional data which may be used to create the window. If the window is being created as a result of a call to the or function, this member contains the value of the lpParam parameter specified in the function call.
If the window being created is a MDI client window, this member contains a pointer to a structure. If the window being created is a MDI child window, this member contains a pointer to an structure.

If the window is being created from a dialog template, this member is the address of a SHORT value that specifies the size, in bytes, of the window creation data. The value is immediately followed by the creation data. For more information, see the following Remarks section.

member.name: CREATESTRUCTA.hInstance
member.summary: A handle to the module that owns the new window.

member.name: CREATESTRUCTA.hMenu
member.summary: A handle to the menu to be used by the new window.

member.name: CREATESTRUCTA.hwndParent
member.summary: A handle to the parent window, if the window is a child window. If the window is owned, this member identifies the owner window. If the window is not a child or owned window, this member is NULL.

member.name: CREATESTRUCTA.cy
member.summary: The height of the new window, in pixels.

member.name: CREATESTRUCTA.cx
member.summary: The width of the new window, in pixels.

member.name: CREATESTRUCTA.y
member.summary: The y-coordinate of the upper left corner of the new window. If the new window is a child window, coordinates are relative to the parent window. Otherwise, the coordinates are relative to the screen origin.

member.name: CREATESTRUCTA.x
member.summary: The x-coordinate of the upper left corner of the new window. If the new window is a child window, coordinates are relative to the parent window. Otherwise, the coordinates are relative to the screen origin.

member.name: CREATESTRUCTA.style
member.summary: The style for the new window. For a list of possible values, see Window Styles.

member.name: CREATESTRUCTA.lpszName
member.summary: The name of the new window.

member.name: CREATESTRUCTA.lpszClass
member.summary: A pointer to a null-terminated string or an atom that specifies the class name of the new window.

member.name: CREATESTRUCTA.dwExStyle
member.summary: The extended window style for the new window. For a list of possible values, see Extended Window Styles.
